from vpython import *

# Screen Settings
scene = canvas(width=700, height=400)

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
ball = sphere(pos=vector(0, Height_I, 0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)
ground = box(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), size=vector(20, 0.1, 10), color=color.green)

initial_height = 5
Height_I = initial_height

def reset_simulation():
    ball.pos = vector(0, Height_I, 0)
    ball.velocity = vector(5, 0, 0)

def update_height(value):
    global Height_I
    Height_I = value
    reset_simulation()

scene.bind('keydown', lambda: update_height(Height_I + 1))

reset_simulation()

while True:
    rate(60)
    ball.pos.x += ball.velocity.x
    ball.velocity.y -= 9.81 * 0.01
    ball.pos.y += ball.velocity.y
    if ball.pos.y <= 0:
        ball.velocity.y *= -1
